item.title: Mapping Pad Development Activity
item.description: Data Sources and Methodology Data obtained from IHS and filtered to permit dates beginning in 2017. Well cluster counts will identify pads, sections and multi-section development dependent upon well density. 2nd map results were filtered by spud date to show activity starting in Q3â€™17. Map Identifies Developments From Permits, Spuds and Completions Beginning in 2017 {"
